explains: adj. 有保存力的；保存性的
wordGroup: conservatory of music 音乐学院

sentences.en: At one point a bird trilled in the conservatory.
sentences.cn: 在某一刻，一只鸟儿在温室里唧啾啼叫。

sentences.en: The conservatory will get very hot in summer unless shading is used.
sentences.cn: 夏天如果不用遮光罩的话，暖房会变得非常热。

sentences.en: Replete, guests can then retire to the modern conservatory for coffee.
sentences.cn: 吃饱喝足后，宾客们可以到现代化的暖房里享受一杯咖啡。
